europeana:record.dc:title: A case study of variation in two nominal species of Sinularia (Coelenterata: Octocorallia), S. brassica May, 1898, and S. dura (Pratt, 1903), with a proposal for their synonymy
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Benayahu Y.
Ofwegen, van L.P.
Alderslade P.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Porifera, Coelenterata, Echinodermata, Brachyopoda
Coelenterata; Anthozoa; Octocorallia; Sinularia brassica; S. dura; synonymy.
europeana:record.dc:description: Two nominal species of Sinularia (Coelenterata: Octocorallia), S. brassica May, 1898 and S. dura (Pratt, 1903), are redescribed and figured. Their synonymy is proposed. Additional material from a number of diverse Indo-Pacific geographic locations is presented.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A case study of variation in two nominal species of Sinularia (Coelenterata: Octocorallia), S. brassica May, 1898, and S. dura (Pratt, 1903), with a proposal for their synonymy (URN:ISSN:0024-1652) (Volume 323) (Issue 23)
